!Bard Rukal: Mages who command the ultimate elemental magic is like a song from heavens. Unlike other magic, Elemental Magic is used by combining the songs of the spirits. However not even the element's tone is heard in your ears? Indeed, a symphony of swords and shields or a hymn of prayer and blessings will be easier to hear for you.
